types.section:
{{fr-intj}}

# [[oh really]]?

====Usage notes====
* Always has an ironic touch to it, implying that the listener doesn't care about what he's been told.
* Not to be confused with {{m|fr|tu m'en diras des nouvelles}}.

title: tu m'en diras tant
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ty m‿ɑ̃ di.ʁa tɑ̃/ ~ /ty m‿ɑ̃ di.ʁɑ tɑ̃/
